user.name: Austen Allred
user.description: Founder https://t.co/m6TigM4CJT. Will tweet as I wish and suffer the consequences.

fullText:
I asked my wife how often she uses an LLM.

She didn’t know what that meant.

So I asked her if she uses ChatGPT, expecting to hear her say a couple times/week.

Nope, 5-6 times/day.

“What model do you use?”

No idea what that means. 

But it works well enough.

fullText:
SaaS companies competed by passing efficiencies to customers by reducing prices.

AI companies will do this by expending more compute per query.

It’s a mistake to think tokens getting cheaper means lower prices or better margins.
